alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 9:54PM EST until February 19 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84) affecting Brooks and Lowndes Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd), Quitman (US 84)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84). * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, In Lowndes County, the boat ramp at the Clyattville Nankin road is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 105.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EST Thursday was 105.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 105.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 104.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 105.4 feet on 10/07/1929. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
